thread.title: Ashley Roberts breaks silence over Scarlett Moffatt taking her spot on Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway
thread.title_full: Ashley Roberts breaks silence over Scarlett Moffatt taking her spot on Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway

author: tpearce
title: Ashley Roberts breaks silence over Scarlett Moffatt taking her spot on Ant and Dec’s Saturday Night Takeaway
text:
Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments PUSSYCAT DOLL Ashley Roberts has opened up about being given the boot from Saturday Night Takeaway and being replaced with Scarlett Moffatt. 
The pop star has hosted the Saturday game show alongside Ant and Dec for the past four series, but it was announced this year she would be replaced with Gogglebox star Scarlett. Getty Images 5 Ashley asserts that theres no hard feelings between her and Scarlett 
However, despite not seeing or talking to Scarlett, and admitting she barely knew who the fun-loving northerner was, she has revealed that she has “nothing but well wishes” for her ahead of her debut next Saturday. 
Speaking to Bang! Showbiz, she said: “I don’t really know Scarlett. I didn’t watch the Jungle, and I haven’t really seen her so I don’t really know her personally. Splash News 5 The Geordie lass will join Ant and Dec on Saturday Night Takeaway this weekend 
“But I’m sure the boys are going to have fun with her, and she’ll have such a fun time.” 
The 35-year-old singer-turned-fashion-mogul also admitted that she thinks it will be a perfect match as the three will have the same “banter” as each other. WENN 5 Ashley has been replaced in the role after four seasons 
She added: “It’s been a great run. I did four seasons with the boys and it’s been awesome, I love them to pieces. I’ve known for a little while. 
“Everybody reached out to me and we all had a nice discussion and it was handled well. Again, good wishes.” LATEST FROM TV & SHOWBIZ Lady Gaga and Justin Bieber lead the stars getting wacky with their celebrity style Love affair diver's film bow Tom Daley seen filming for first acting role in horror movie Sharknado 5 after we revealed fling with model STARTER FOR TENDER Jeremy Paxman spotted looking grumpy with his new love as they are pictured together for the first time following his split from wife from diva to disaster How Mariah Carey went from ruling the music world to being the biggest laughing stock in the industry BOOTYLICIOUS Katie Price flaunts her peachy bum as she marks her 10th non-surgical bum lift session 'THIS LITTLE MAN' David Beckham posts loving picture with son Cruz as clock strikes midnight on his birthday Give it a tan-go Ex-EastEnders star Samantha Womack keen to take to dance floor in this year's Strictly HAVIN' A DOMESTIC Towie's Lydia Bright films Gemma Collins and BFF Bobby Norris having explosive row after filming TV PICKS What's on TV tonight? Shows to watch on Monday 20 February from The Halycon to The Trouble with Dad UNDER THE SEA BBC announce a second series of Blue Planet and reveal Sir David Attenborough will narrate MERMAID AMBITION Lindsay Lohan urges Disney to remake The Little Mermaid - with her in the lead role of Ariel KHAN'T GO ON Chloe Khan reveals she's split from Ashley Cain - but insists there are no hard feelings 
Meanwhile, 26-year-old Scarlett has admitted that she worries people will “get sick of her” after landing a series of highly sought-after jobs after winning last year’s I’m a Celebrity, Get Me Out of Here. 
Speaking to You magazine , she said: “I turn down so many things because I don’t want people to get sick of me. I refuse to promote anything on Instagram for money and I’m aware that I have to be careful about saying yes to anything.” Rex Features 5 Scarlett has been on a winning streak since being crowned the Im a Celeb queen 
She now has the career that many aspiring stars would kill for her and Scarlett revealed it all started for her when a TV researcher friend at York St John University asked her to help find families for a new show called Gogglebox. 
She and her mum Betty, 46, dad Mark, 49, and her 10-year-old sister Ava went on to become fan favourites. 
Scarlett revealed: “He asked me if my family would do it. We had two days to think about it. Me and my mum weren’t keen but my dad said: ‘What’s the worst that can happen?’ Getty Images 5 Ashley has now released her own footwear range 
“None of us really thought anything of doing it. We were just ourselves. It was bizarre when people started paying attention to us. I kept thinking, ‘Why?'” 
She continued: “I can’t think of a nicer way to get well known, doing a show like that with your mam and dad in your sitting room. All of it has been amazing. Ant and Dec return with a new series of Saturday Night Takeaway 
"I don’t even care when bad stories are written about me that aren’t true. I know what’s true, my family knows what’s true and the response I get from people in the street is always great. 
"People come up and hug me. Who could ever object to that?"
